mainText:
Steve Jobs was truly an incredible and inspiring man, from his exuberant 
youth and through his long and courageous struggle.  He created the 
world of personal computers and through that, and other contributions of 
his genius along the way, dramatically affected our daily lives for the 
past few decades - and years to come.  We will surely miss him.
header: Thank you Steve Jobs for all you have given us
author: Leon
